effect.x_y: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.
effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Changes the target’s ability to match the user’s. This effect ends when the target leaves battle.

short_effect.x_y: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.
short_effect.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: Copies the user’s ability onto the target.

flavor_text.x_y: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The user dances with an odd rhythm that compels the target to mimic it, making the target’s Ability the same as the user’s.
